Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 700 TVL Dome Camera
Reviews.Author: Kyle 07
Reviews.Content: Camera hooks into my dvr with a standard bnc connector. I have it installed outside of my house and the picture quality during daylight hours is pretty good, no better then any other camera I have 4 others (2) 420 tvls, (2)540 tvls, in fact it fails the others at night due to the fact it fogs up terribly at night so its nightime range is about 10 feet and hazy.Not sure but I thought a camera with 700 tvls would actually look better then cheaper 25 to 30 dollar cameras but this one definately doesn't. I didn't try the included microphone but it looks good enough.

Reviews.Title: non std connector but good.
Reviews.Author: Zurk
Reviews.Content: has a non std bnc connector which reqd an adaptor. this camera works ok. agressive agc so its mostly b&w;  but does switch to color.halo effect at night.

Reviews.Title: Delivered Wrong Item
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I ordered cameras with mini microphones and when I finally got the tech to show up and install them, there was no microphone included. I am now stuck with cameras I did not want, or forced to pay extra tech costs, etc. in excess of the value of the cameras. HORRIBLE SERVICE FOR A DEDICATED AND LONG TIME CUSTOMER!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD, Color DSP, Automatic CDS Sensor
700 TV Lines high resolution. 28 LED IR Illuminators for night vision
Weatherproof aluminum housing construction
Build-in f3.6mm wide view angle Lens, 0 Lux ( IR LED ON)
Package included: 1 of color CCD camera, 1 of Pre-Amp mini hidden microphone, 1 of video audio power cable, 1 of power supply and 1 of security warning DeCal 3"x2"
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL Built-in Sony Effio CCD Infrared Outdoor Dome Security Camera Vandal Armor Day Night Vision Camera for CCTV DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply, Pre-Amp Mini Hidden Microphone and Video Audio Power Cable A77
